info.title: Interactive Dashboard API
info.description: Interactive Dashboard API for Worex Technology

post.summary: Registers a normal user to the system.

200.description: Returned if user is registered successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Logging in a user to the system.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Post active process details data from the agent.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Post machine memory and cpu utilization data from the agent.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Post window time data from the agent.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Registers a Allowed Application to the system.

200.description: Returned if the Application inserted successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Registers a Allowed Application to the system.

200.description: Returned if the Application inserted successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Registers a normal user to the system.

200.description: Returned if user is registered successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Registers an admin user to the system.

200.description: Returned if admin is registered successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Logging in a user to the system.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Registers a computer to the system.

200.description: Returned if the computer inserted successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

post.summary: Registers a computer to the system.

200.description: Returned if the computer inserted successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

get.summary: Gets Machine Memory Utilization Percentage from the system.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username to filter on it.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

get.summary: Gets applications list from the system.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

get.summary: Gets application usage details from the system.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

get.summary: Gets active process details average usage from the system.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

get.summary: Gets application process details for top utilized applications from the system.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username to filter on it.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

get.summary: Gets top used tabs for user from the system.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username to filter on it.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The groupId to filter on it.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

get.summary: Gets machine and cpu utilization for processes of user from the system.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username to filter on it.

200.description: Returned if user is logged in successfully

500.description: Returned if an internal server error

Bearer.description:
Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your valid token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9"
Bearer.name: Authorization
